page.title: 15My fathers job
page.content: The roadman's day starts at 9.00am. His day could consist of checking the roads, getting rid of the weeds beside the road, clearing ditches, sweeping roads and repairing any damage. Other tasks from time to time might be tarring and chipping the road, sanding the roads during the icy weathers, repairing damage to roadside walls and fences. The roadmen do not have any heavy equipment therefore they have to hire tractors from local farmers and any other heavy equipment has to be brought in from Oban on the boat. From time to time a coaster brings in chips and tarry metal for the roads. althougth there are two roadmen employed they find it very hard to mentain the roads to the required standard and they would like to see more improvements made to Colls roads.
